AboutUs.title: Welding craftsmanship forging excellence
AboutUs.subTitle: ABOUT US
AboutUs.description:
We are a team of specialists characterized not only by the ability to weld perfectly but also by a deep passion for creation. Our experience, built on a decade of practice, allows us to boldly walk the path of excellence.

Every project is a challenge that we take on with determination to provide our clients not only with a product of the highest quality but also with satisfaction and the confidence that their expectations have been exceeded.

Excellence.title: Steel structures across Germany and Poland
Excellence.subTitle: Perfect execution
Excellence.description: Our work is not just about flawless execution; it's also about passion and dedication that always lead to excellence. We create steel structures in Poland and every region of Germany.

Faq.title: WHAT YOU SHOULD KNOW
Faq.question1: Can you design railings and fences tailored to my individual needs?
Faq.answer1: Of course! Our design team specializes in creating custom solutions that perfectly match your requirements and preferences. Whether you need a railing with an unusual shape or a uniquely patterned fence, we are ready to bring your ideas to life.
Faq.question2: Can I get advice on choosing the right solution for my space?
Faq.answer2: Absolutely! Our team of specialists provides expert advice at every stage of the process. From the first contact to the final installation, we are here to answer your questions, share our knowledge, and help you choose the best solution for your home or garden.
Faq.answer3: Yes, comprehensive service is our standard. Our experienced installation team ensures professional and precise assembly of all structural elements, guaranteeing that your railings, fences, or stairs are installed according to the highest standards.
Faq.question4: What are the benefits of using railings and fences made by your company?
Faq.answer4: By choosing our products, you can be sure that you receive not only aesthetically pleasing and solid structures but also a guarantee of high quality. Our railings, fences, and other elements are carefully designed and manufactured with durability and functionality in mind, making them both an attractive feature of your space and a long-term investment.
Faq.question5: Are your structures easy to maintain?
Faq.answer5: Yes, we prioritize durability and ease of maintenance. Depending on the chosen material and finish, most of our constructions require minimal upkeep, allowing you to enjoy them for many years without frequent maintenance.
Faq.question6: Do you offer a warranty on your products and services?
Faq.answer6: Yes, we provide a warranty on all our products and installation work. Our goal is complete customer satisfaction, so we strive to ensure not only the highest quality of our constructions but also comprehensive after-sales service. If any issues arise with our products or services, we are ready to take corrective actions to ensure your satisfaction.
Faq.question7: How much does welding steel structures cost?
Faq.answer7: The price depends on the material, design, and scope of work. Contact us for a free quote.
Faq.question8: What types of steel fences do you offer?
Faq.answer8: We offer panel fences, wrought iron fences, and powder-coated steel fences tailored to your needs.
Faq.question9: Do you manufacture sliding and swing gates on request?
Faq.answer9: Yes, we create custom steel gate designs tailored to your property.
Faq.question10: What anti-corrosion protections do you use?
Faq.answer10: We use hot-dip galvanizing and powder coating to ensure the longevity of steel.
Faq.question11: How can I order steel railings or fences?
Faq.answer11: Contact us, provide dimensions and expectations, and we will prepare a personalized offer.
Faq.ctaTitle: Didn‚Äôt find the answer to your question?
Faq.contactDescription: Contact us ‚Äì we‚Äôll respond quickly and recommend the best solution for you.

OurProcess.title: THE BEST EXPERIENCE IN IMPLEMENTATION
OurProcess.subTitle: OUR PROCESS
OurProcess.description:
Our order execution process guarantees the highest quality and professionalism at every stage. Through thorough consultation, precise production, and meticulous installation, we provide our clients with an unmatched experience that meets even the highest expectations.

Our passion for excellence is the key to the success of every project.
OurProcess.count1description: We begin with a detailed consultation to determine your needs and preferences. Then, we create a personalized design.
OurProcess.count2description: After project approval, we proceed to production and welding. Our experienced teams ensure high quality and precision.
OurProcess.count3description: After production, we deliver the ordered elements to the site and carefully install them, paying attention to every detail.

OurServices.title: FORGING CONNECTIONS. IGNITING PROGRESS.
OurServices.subTitle: Our Services
OurServices.count1description: Our welding expertise allows us to create railings and fences with exceptional durability and aesthetics. No matter the project, we are ready to deliver solid and elegant solutions that enhance your space.
OurServices.count2description: Need a custom metal structure? Our team of specialists can design and manufacture exactly what you need. Whether it‚Äôs a windmill, advertising frame, or architectural element, we guarantee high quality and precision.
OurServices.count3description: With our experience and welding skills, we can create stairs and balconies that are not only aesthetically pleasing but also provide long-lasting safety and durability.
OurServices.count4description: Dreaming of a unique winter garden or recreational space? We can bring your vision to life, creating welded structures that become the heart of relaxation and entertainment for you and your loved ones.
OurServices.count5description: You don‚Äôt need to worry about assembling our structures‚Äîour qualified technicians will take care of it for you. With our professional approach and attention to detail, everything will be installed to the highest standards.
OurServices.count6description: Need help choosing the best solution for your project? Our team of consultants and designers offers expert support, helping you select the right materials, structures, and technical solutions that meet your expectations and needs.

Realization.title: Completed Orders of Our Clients
Realization.subTitle: Realizations
Realization.count1description: Safe railings, elegance in every detail.
Realization.count4description: Sturdy fences, your privacy fully protected.

Steps.qualityDescription: Exceptional precision and attention to detail are our top priorities. Every element is crafted with utmost care to ensure the highest quality and customer satisfaction.
Steps.applyDescription: We use only the highest quality materials that comply with the latest standards and hold certifications guaranteeing their quality and safety.
Steps.priceDescription: We offer competitive pricing regardless of project scale, without compromising on quality. Our goal is to provide valuable services while maintaining attractive rates for our clients.
Steps.expierienceDescription: With over a decade of experience in the industry, our company has built a solid reputation, earned customer trust, and developed expertise over the years.

VisionMission.title: Our Vision and Mission: Creating Strong Connections and Innovative Solutions
VisionMission.subTitle: Vision and Mission
VisionMission.description: We are committed to quality and precision in our work. We don't just create fences, gates, and railings, but also build lasting relationships with our clients. Our mission is to ensure not only safety and aesthetics but also complete satisfaction and trust.
VisionMission.missionDescription: We confidently focus on quality and precision, creating not only fences, gates, and railings but also lasting bonds with our clients. Our mission is to ensure not only safety and aesthetics but also satisfaction and trust.
VisionMission.visionDescription: We envision a world where our products are not just architectural elements but also symbols of solidity and style. Our vision includes inspiring spaces that connect people and inspire continuous progress and development.

About.title: About Us
About.descriptionTitle: Professional Welding and Metal Products in the Polish and German Markets
About.description:
Welcome to Stalumo ‚Äì a company passionate about metal and committed to excellence. With over 10 years of experience in the Polish and German markets, we pride ourselves on our reputation as a reliable partner in the metal industry.

Since our inception in 2010, we have been continually striving to raise the standards of quality and professionalism in our work. Our services cover a wide range of activities, from welding to the production of gates, fences, railings, balconies, canopies, and winter gardens ‚Äì always with attention to detail and precision.

We are confident that our products and services stand out not only for their excellent quality but also for flexibility and a personalized approach to client needs. Each order is treated as unique, and we tailor our solutions to specific requirements, guaranteeing satisfaction for even the most demanding clients.

What sets us apart? In addition to our commitment to delivering the highest quality products, we are also a cohesive team of professionals ready to tackle even the most complex challenges. Our company consists of skilled specialists for whom metalworking is not just a job but a true passion.

We operate not only in Poland but also in Germany, which allows us to expand our reach and offer our products and services to clients abroad. Our presence in two markets also enables us to continuously grow and improve our skills to meet the evolving needs of our clients.

If you are looking for a professional partner in the metal industry who will provide you with not only high-quality products but also comprehensive service and support at every stage of your project ‚Äì Stalumo is the perfect choice for you. Join our satisfied clients and see for yourself why Stalumo guarantees reliability, quality, and professionalism.
About.timeLineHeader: How does cooperation with STALUMO work?
About.ctaDescription: Get in touch to request a quote, schedule a measurement, or learn more about our fencing offer.
About.timeLineDescriptionContact: Contact us via the form, phone, or email. Based on the information provided, we will prepare a free, non-binding quote and answer any questions about the project.
About.timeLineDescriptionSize: Our specialist will get in touch with you to schedule an on-site measurement. This allows us to design a solution tailored to your expectations and the technical conditions of the building or site.
About.timeLineDescriptionProduction: During the production phase, we use only proven technologies and high-quality steel. Every component is precisely crafted with attention to detail to ensure durability, functionality, and aesthetics for years to come.
About.timeLineDescriptionMake: Once production is complete, our experienced installation team will assemble the structure on-site. We ensure cleanliness, precision, and punctuality to make the entire process smooth and professional.
About.timeLineDescriptionWarranty: All our products undergo rigorous quality control to ensure solid craftsmanship. We also provide ongoing post-sale support, so you can always count on our assistance and advice.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.description: Got a project in mind? Reach out to us via the contact form, and we'll respond as soon as possible. We're happy to assist you in bringing your idea to life, ensuring expert help and top-quality execution. We look forward to your questions and suggestions ‚Äì together, we‚Äôll create something exceptional!

Gallery.title: Gallery
Gallery.cta: Get in touch ‚Äì we‚Äôll advise and quote you
Gallery.ctaTitle: Modern steel railings, fences, gates and steel structures | STALUMO
Gallery.contactDescription: We create durable fences, railings, and custom steel structures. Operating in Poland and Germany. Free quote ‚Äì quick contact!

railings.header: Steel Railings ‚Äì durability, style and safety
railings.description1: Our steel railings are crafted with precision, top-quality materials, and modern aesthetics. Designed with functionality and safety in mind, they maintain a timeless appearance. Suitable for both residential and commercial spaces ‚Äì from balconies and terraces to staircases and mezzanines.
railings.description2: We use stainless steel, powder-coated black steel, or combine different materials for unique effects ‚Äì such as wood, glass, or laser-cut panels. Every project is tailored to the client‚Äôs architecture and preferences.
railings.description3: Working with us guarantees durability, style, and top-level execution. Contact us and we‚Äôll design a railing that becomes an integral part of your space.
railings.example1: High resistance to weather (stainless and powder-coated steel)
railings.example2: Combination with wood, glass, laser-cut mesh possible
railings.example3: Ideal for balconies, stairs, mezzanines and commercial spaces
railings.example4: Custom design matched to your architecture and vision
railings.mateiralDescription: We use only certified materials. Our railings are mainly made from stainless steel 304/316, and for a modern contrast ‚Äì powder-coated black steel. On request, we include elements of natural oak wood, tempered glass, and CNC decorative details.
railings.efectDescription: Above we present the effect of one of our projects: a balcony in a detached house transformed from an outdated and unsafe construction into an elegant stainless steel railing with wooden elements.
railings.contactDescription: Contact us for a personalized quote and visualization of your new railing. We'll advise on the best materials and style to match your interior or facade.

fences.header: Steel fences ‚Äì protection and aesthetics in one
fences.description1: Our steel fences perfectly combine security, durability, and elegance. Made from high-quality steel, they not only protect your property but also enhance its appearance. We offer both modern and classic designs tailored to your home and surroundings.
fences.description2: We use powder-coated black steel, stainless steel, and forged elements. On request, we combine with wood, perforated sheets, or laser-cut panels.
fences.description3: Each fence is created with individual customer needs in mind, and our team provides comprehensive service from design to installation.
fences.example1: Durability and corrosion resistance thanks to powder coating
fences.example2: Wide range of designs, colors and infills (sheet metal, wood, steel mesh)
fences.example3: Match to architectural style ‚Äì from modern to classic
fences.example4: Comprehensive service ‚Äì measuring, design, production and installation
fences.example5: Integration with sliding or swing gates possible
fences.mateiralDescription: We use only certified materials: galvanized powder-coated steel, stainless steel, perforated sheets, and oak or larch wood. We ensure aesthetics, durability, and flawless finish for every element.
fences.efectDescription: Above is a modernization of an old wire mesh fence. It was replaced with a modern powder-coated steel panel fence, which improved both the appearance and security of the property.
fences.contactDescription: Contact us to create a fence perfectly tailored to your needs. We offer expert advice, measuring, and comprehensive project execution.

gates.description1: We offer modern gates suitable for any property ‚Äì from minimalist designs to decorative constructions with wooden or laser-cut elements. We focus on quality, durability, and visual harmony with the surroundings.
gates.description2: We carry out custom projects, including sliding, double-leaf, and automatic gates. We use top-grade materials ‚Äì stainless steel, powder-coated steel, wood, and glass. Each gate combines aesthetics with modern technology.
gates.description3: We pay attention to every detail ‚Äì from design to production to professional installation. Our gates become the property's showcase and provide reliable protection for years.
gates.example2: Full automation ‚Äì gates with drive system
gates.example3: Custom projects tailored to the surroundings
gates.example4: Durable materials ‚Äì steel, wood, glass, aluminum
gates.example5: Complete installation in Poland and abroad
gates.mateiralDescription: All our gates are made from certified materials: stainless steel, powder-coated steel, oak wood, aluminum, and tempered glass. We also offer decorative laser-cut elements and custom finishes per client‚Äôs vision.
gates.efectDescription: Above is an example of replacing an old double-leaf gate with a modern sliding gate with automation and a decorative laser-cut panel. It shows how a gate can completely transform a property‚Äôs appearance.
gates.contactDescription: Need a functional and beautiful gate? Contact us ‚Äì we‚Äôll prepare a custom project, advise the best solutions, and handle every step of the process.

otherstell.header: Other steel structures ‚Äì durability, precision and modern solutions
otherstell.description1: We design and manufacture a variety of steel structures tailored to client needs ‚Äì from architectural elements and frames to unique technical solutions. Our work stands out for durability and aesthetics.
otherstell.description2: We use top-quality materials ‚Äì stainless steel, powder-coated steel, and combinations with wood and glass, creating durable and functional structures. Each project is customized to the investment‚Äôs specifics.
otherstell.description3: We provide full service ‚Äì from concept through production to on-site installation. Our steel structures combine modernity with solid workmanship.
otherstell.example1: Versatile and durable solutions for various applications
otherstell.example2: Materials resistant to corrosion and weather conditions
otherstell.example3: Custom designs tailored to client requirements
otherstell.example4: Combination of steel with other materials ‚Äì wood, glass, aluminum
otherstell.example5: Professional installation in Poland and abroad
otherstell.mateiralDescription: We make all structures from certified materials: stainless steel 304/316, powder-coated steel, oak wood, tempered glass, and laser-cut decorative elements. We guarantee durability and aesthetics.
otherstell.efectDescription: Above is an example of transforming an old steel structure into a modern, solid architectural element combining functionality with aesthetics.
otherstell.contactTitle: Design your steel structure with us
otherstell.contactDescription: Need a durable and aesthetic steel structure? Contact us to discuss the details ‚Äì we‚Äôll prepare a custom project and deliver at the highest level.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy ‚Äì stalumo.com
PrivacyPolicy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains what data we collect, why we collect it, who manages it, and what rights you have as a user of stalumo.com. Providing personal data is voluntary, but necessary to receive a reply when contacting us through the form.
PrivacyPolicy.section1Content:
The data controller is:
Stalumo
ul. Kolejowa 6
73-220 Drawno
Poland
NIP: 5941613140
üìû +48 784-532-549
‚úâÔ∏è office@stalumo.com
To exercise your data rights, please contact us via email. We will respond within 30 days at the latest.
PrivacyPolicy.section2aTitle: a) Data from the contact form
PrivacyPolicy.section2aContent: Name (if provided), email address, subject of the message, and its content. This data is used solely for handling your inquiry and is not shared with third parties without a valid legal basis. Providing this data is voluntary but necessary to receive a reply.
PrivacyPolicy.section2bContent: Our website uses cookies, including analytical cookies from Google Analytics, which may collect: anonymized IP address, operating system and browser details, and information about your activity on the site. Consent to use cookies is requested upon your first visit and can be revoked at any time via your browser settings.
PrivacyPolicy.section3Content: We use collected data for the following purposes: responding to inquiries, conducting anonymous analytics, and improving the website and user experience. Your data will not be used for automated decision-making or profiling.
PrivacyPolicy.section4Content: Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR ‚Äì your consent; (b) ‚Äì processing necessary for communication; (f) ‚Äì our legitimate interest (e.g. statistics, website security).
PrivacyPolicy.section5Content: Hosting provider, Google LLC (for anonymized analytics data), and public authorities if legally required. Data may also be processed by external partners under data processing agreements, such as IT or hosting providers.
PrivacyPolicy.section6Content: Contact form data: 6 months; Analytics data: 14 months; Cookies: until deleted by the user or expired. Data is stored only as long as necessary for the purposes listed above or in accordance with applicable law.
PrivacyPolicy.section7Content: You have the right to: access your data, request corrections, deletion, or restrictions, object to processing, request data portability, and file a complaint with your national Data Protection Authority. To exercise your rights, contact us at: office@stalumo.com.
PrivacyPolicy.section8Content: We use cookies for: website functionality, analytics (Google Analytics), and improving your experience. You can disable cookies at any time in your browser settings. Third-party services we use may also use their own cookies.
PrivacyPolicy.section9Content: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy. The latest version is always available at stalumo.com/privacy-policy.
PrivacyPolicy.contactNote: Have questions? Contact us at: office@stalumo.com
PrivacyPolicy.section10Content:
We use Google Analytics 4, a web analytics service provided by Google LLC, to anonymously analyze how users interact with our website. Collected data may include anonymized IP addresses, browser and system information, and activity on our site.

By default, before you give your consent, Google Analytics does not store or process your data (analytics_storage: 'denied'). Tracking begins only after you have given your consent via the cookie banner. You may withdraw your consent at any time by adjusting your browser settings or by revisiting the cookie banner (if available).

If any data is transferred to Google LLC (based in the USA), such transfer is based on the European Commission's Standard Contractual Clauses under Article 46 of the GDPR.

More information:
- Google Privacy Policy: https://policies.google.com/privacy
- Google Analytics Terms of Service: https://marketingplatform.google.com/about/analytics/terms/us/
- Standard Contractual Clauses (SCC): https://support.google.com/analytics/answer/9012600
